content: अपेक्षा --क्षणं {@--1@} Expectation, hope, desire. {@--2@} Need, requirement, necessity; निरपेक्ष without hope or need, regardless of; सापेक्षत्वेऽपि गमकत्वात्समासः; अनपेक्षः शुचिर्दक्षः <ls>Bg. 12. 16</ls>; or in <ab>comp.</ab>; स्फुलिंगावस्थया वह्निरेधापेक्ष इव स्थितः <ls>Ś. 7. 15</ls> awaiting kindling. {@--3@} Consideration, reference, regard, with the obj. in <ab>loc.</ab> case; more usually in <ab>comp.</ab>; मध्यभंगानपेक्षं <ls>Ratn. 1. 17</ls> regardless of; the <ab>instr.</ab> and sometimes <ab>loc.</ab> of this word frequently occur in <ab>comp.</ab> meaning ‘with reference to’, ‘out of regard for’, ‘with a view to’, ‘for the sake of’; सापि कार्यकरणापेक्षया क्षुरमेकमादाय तस्याभिमुखं प्रेषयामास <ls>Pt. 1</ls>; नियमापेक्षया <ls>R. 1. 94</ls>; वृषलापेक्षया <ls>Mu. 1</ls>; पौरजनापेक्षया {2} out of regard for; किमकौशलादुत प्रयोजनापेक्षया {3} with a view to gain some object; प्रथमसुकृतापेक्षया <ls>Me. 17</ls>; दंडं शक्त्यपेक्षं <ls>Y. 2. 26</ls> in proportion to, in accordance with; अत्र व्यंग्यं गुणीभूतं तदपेक्षया वाच्यस्यैव चमत्कारिकत्वात् <ls>K. P. 1</ls> as compared with it. {@--4@} Connection, relation, dependence as of cause with effect or of individual with species; शरीरसाधनापेक्षं नित्यं यत्कर्म तद्यमः <ls>Ak.</ls> {@--5@} Care, attention, heed; देशापेशाक्षास्तथा यूयं यातादायांगुरीयकं <ls>Bk. 7. 49.</ls> {@--6@} Respect, deference. {@--7@} (In <ab>gram.</ab>) = आकांक्षा <ab>q. v.</ab>
